metadata.title: Wednesday, 12th July, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) why the construction of the National Registration Office in Kalabo District has stalled;

(d) what the contract sum for the project is;
(e) how much money had been paid to the contractor, as of August, 2022; and
(f) what the time frame for the completion of the outstanding works is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to promote rice farming in Chinsali District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) which areas have potential for rice farming in the District.
